segments.text: I'm really quite frustrated by what I'm witnessing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, utterly oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is practically a waterfall, and she hasn't even noticed her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so mad to see such a clear and present danger being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, climbing for cookies on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could fall at any second and get seriously hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a recipe for disaster, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to the hazards?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury or significant property damage is immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down at her feet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a preventable mess and accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small elements are converging into one big problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness is simply infuriating to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR
